# Criminal Background (Feat)
## Overview
You come from a long line of pirates, outlaws, or sneak thieves. Your instincts are bent toward illicit gain and self-preservation above all else.

**Benefit:** [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]], and [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] are all considered class skills. In addition, when observing an individual, you can make a DC 15 [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] check to ascertain any criminal motives. You also gain a +4 bonus on Gather Information checks involving crime and criminals.

**Special:** You must take this feat at 1st level.

**Source:** City of Stormreach (WotC), pg. 95
